lines.text: I mean... it definitely killed Slick.
I can't say for sure if it was an accident or not, but it made the guy pointing a gun at them be dead.
That'd make me think it was on purpose, but...
Well, if they're both dead, then <c=#FF00FF>something</c> went wrong with their plan.
Gonna need somethin' more concrete than that wishy-washy speculation, kid.
